_header: Sith thou Mother of grace hast ever in mind
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, An orison to the Virgin Mary — twenty stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM744.First Lines:
Syn thow modir of grace haast euere in myndeAlle tho þat vp on
                    thee han memorie…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…His passion witnesse bere mayRemembre on þat and preye
                    for vs ay
